snippet.title: The Choreographist - A How To Play Deep Dive
snippet.description:
Hey there! This here is a description of a game we both "Almost" and "Sort Of" made! Thank you for taking a quick peek at "The Choreographist"!

CHAPTERS:
Intro:
00:00 What Is The Choreographist?
00:54 Scoring And Goals

Gameplay Basics:
01:30 Basic Attacks
02:03 Freestyle Attacks
03:18 Trigger Notes (Abilities)
04:17 Defense

Advanced Maneuvers:
05:04 Trigger Swapping
05:48 Strategy And Score
06:49 EX Burning, Defensive Counters, Hard Swaps and Ultimates
10:07 Orb Stuffing

More Gameplay:
11:13 Puzzle Challenges

This video provides a deeper summary of the more mechanical elements of The Choreographist, as well as some gameplay basics and the advanced tools at your disposal to create a really colossal combo and high score.
Please take look at the first chapter of the video for a snapshot of how the basic game loop works, and then dive deeper by staying for the Advanced Maneuvers section, which really peels back the curtain on the inner-workings of the game.

Thank you so much to Cat Arthur and to J-Punch and Dave Moonshine for the shiny shiny tunes.

GET THE FULLY-PLAYABLE, INCOMPLETE THANG FREE RIGHT NOW:
https://akuparagames.itch.io/the-choreographist
